text: Blood & Guts (2022) was a professional wrestling show made by All Elite Wrestling (AEW). It took place on June 29, 2022 at the Little Caesars Arena in Detroit, Michigan. The event aired as a special episode of Dynamite. It was the second Blood & Guts event held by AEW. A special episode of Rampage, titled Royal Rampage, was also recorded that evening and aired on July 1. The Dynamite main event saw Eddie Kingston, Santana, Ortiz, and Blackpool Combat Club (Jon Moxley, Claudio Castagnoli, and Wheeler Yuta) defeat The Jericho Appreciation Society (Chris Jericho, Jake Hager, Sammy Guevara, Daniel Garcia, Matt Menard, and Angelo Parker) in a Blood and Guts match. The match was won when Castagnoli put Menard in the Sharpshooter and made him tap out. At the same time, Kingston had Jericho in the Buffalo Stretch. ==Matches== === Dynamite (aired live June 29) === No. Results Stipulations Times 1 Orange Cassidy defeated Ethan Page (with Dan Lambert) Singles match 11:00 2 Luchasaurus (with Christian Cage) defeated Serpentico Singles match 0:55 3 Danhausen and FTR (Cash Wheeler and Dax Harwood) defeated Max Caster and Gunn Club (Austin and Colten Gunn) (with Anthony Bowens and Billy Gunn) Six-man tag team match 9:35 4 Jade Cargill (c) (with Stokely Hathaway and Kiera Hogan) defeated Leila Grey Singles match for the AEW TBS Championship 1:55 5 Eddie Kingston, Santana, Ortiz, and Blackpool Combat Club (Jon Moxley, Claudio Castagnoli, and Wheeler Yuta) (with William Regal) defeated The Jericho Appreciation Society (Chris Jericho, Jake Hager, Sammy Guevara, Daniel Garcia, Matt Menard, and Angelo Parker) (with Tay Conti) by submission Blood and Guts match 46:45 (c) – is the champion(s) going into the match === Royal Rampage (aired July 1) === No. Results Stipulations Times 1 Brody King won by last eliminating Darby Allin 20-man Royal Rampage Battle Royal for a future Interim AEW World Championship match 22:46 2 The Young Bucks (Matt and Nick Jackson) (with Brandon Cutler) defeated Bishamon (Hirooki Goto and Yoshi-Hashi) Tag team match 10:37 3 Toni Storm defeated Nyla Rose (with Marina Shafir) Singles match 9:45 ==== Royal Rampage match entrances and eliminations ==== In this two-ring 20-man rumble rules battle royale, 10 wrestlers entered each ring separately. It started with two wrestlers in each ring, then another wrestler entered either the red or the blue ring every minute. Eliminations happened when a competitor went over the top rope. The final two standing wrestlers in each ring faced on any of the two rings under battle royal rules to determine a winner. – Blue Ring – Red Ring – Winner Draw Entrant Order Eliminated by Elimination(s) Tony Nese 1 Darby Allin 0 Powerhouse Hobbs 12 Keith Lee 1 "Hangman" Adam Page 16 Brody King 1 Darby Allin 19 Brody King 3 Ricky Starks 15 "Hangman" Adam Page 3 The Butcher 18 Darby Allin 3 John Silver 2 Ricky Starks 0 Max Caster 3 Swerve Strickland 0 Rush 5 Penta Oscuro 1 The Blade 17 Darby Allin 4 Penta Oscuro 4 Rush 1 Swerve Strickland 14 The Butcher and the Blade 2 Keith Lee 13 Ricky Starks 1 Matt Hardy 6 The Butcher and the Blade 0 Dustin Rhodes 9 Powerhouse Hobbs and Ricky Starks 0 Frankie Kazarian 7 The Blade 0 Dante Martin 8 Brody King 0 Konosuke Takeshita 10 The Butcher and the Blade 0 Brody King Winner 3 Orange Cassidy 11 Swerve Strickland 0 ==References== Category:2022 in American sports Category:AEW Blood and Guts Category:Sports in Detroit
title: Blood & Guts (2022)
